template.template: Linux generic by Zabbix agent active
template.name: Linux generic by Zabbix agent active

item.name: Maximum number of open file descriptors
item.description: It could be increased by using sysctl utility or modifying file /etc/sysctl.conf.

trigger.name: Configured max number of open filedescriptors is too low
trigger.event_name: Configured max number of open filedescriptors is too low (< {$KERNEL.MAXFILES.MIN})

item.name: Maximum number of processes
item.description: It could be increased by using sysctl utility or modifying file /etc/sysctl.conf.

trigger.name: Configured max number of processes is too low
trigger.event_name: Configured max number of processes is too low (< {$KERNEL.MAXPROC.MIN})

dependency.name: Getting closer to process limit
dependency.expression: last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/proc.num)/last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/kernel.maxproc)*100>80

trigger.expression: last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.hostname,#1)<>last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.hostname,#2) and length(last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.hostname))>0
trigger.name: System name has changed
trigger.description: System name has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: System local time
item.description: System local time of the host.

trigger.name: System time is out of sync
trigger.event_name: System time is out of sync (diff with Zabbix server > {$SYSTEM.FUZZYTIME.MAX}s)
trigger.description: The host system time is different from the Zabbix server time.

item.name: Operating system architecture
item.description: Operating system architecture of the host.

trigger.expression: last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.sw.os,#1)<>last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.sw.os,#2) and length(last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.sw.os))>0
trigger.name: Operating system description has changed
trigger.description: Operating system description has changed. Possible reasons that system has been updated or replaced. Ack to close.

dependency.name: System name has changed
dependency.expression: last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.hostname,#1)<>last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.hostname,#2) and length(last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.hostname))>0

item.name: System description
item.description: The information as normally returned by 'uname -a'.

item.name: System uptime
item.description: System uptime in 'N days, hh:mm:ss' format.

trigger.expression: last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.uptime)<10m
trigger.name: has been restarted
trigger.description: The host uptime is less than 10 minutes

item.name: Number of logged in users
item.description: Number of users who are currently logged in.

trigger.expression: last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/vfs.file.cksum[/etc/passwd,sha256],#1)<>last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/vfs.file.cksum[/etc/passwd,sha256],#2)
trigger.name: /etc/passwd has been changed

dependency.name: Operating system description has changed
dependency.expression: last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.sw.os,#1)<>last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.sw.os,#2) and length(last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.sw.os))>0

dependency.name: System name has changed
dependency.expression: last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.hostname,#1)<>last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.hostname,#2) and length(last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/system.hostname))>0

trigger.expression: last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/proc.num)/last(/Linux generic by Zabbix agent active/kernel.maxproc)*100>80
trigger.name: Getting closer to process limit
trigger.event_name: Getting closer to process limit (over 80% used)

item.host: Linux generic by Zabbix agent active
Linux generic by Zabbix agent active
